name: Cashier
desc: Take the money. Be nice. That is all.

name: Monitor
desc: Watch people. Tell an EC. Still get yelled at.

name: Event Coordinator
desc: Shadow: Cashier, Ambassador and Monitor. Never get it "right." Have everyone hate you then hate you again for not showing up early to stay late for a party you maybe don"t care about.

name: Ambassador
desc: Be nice to people. Show them around. Don"t hit on them or try to make dates.

name: Food Prep
desc: Prep food. Don"t make attendees sick.

name: Library-Host
desc: I think... I mean, I don"t really know.

name: Librarian
desc: Check out materials.

name: Setup
desc: Move stuff into place. Then be told it needs to go back over there. Nope, it should have been where it just was. Fuck it, you move it.

name: Staff
desc: Seriously... I have not a clue but you get hours.

name: Strike
desc: Hahahaahah.... I hope you like sleep dep, dipshit.

name: Host
desc: Set the tone for the party.

name: Passport Guide
desc: Go to Passport meeting then go to another party and passport things.

name: Non-Event: Duster
desc: Go in once a week and clean everything.

name: Stocking
desc: Stock soda, candy & peanut dispensers, etc.

name: Office Minion
desc: Do office things, in the office.

name: Laundry Team
desc: Take laundry from the bins and run it through the washing machine and dryer. Wear gloves.

name: MONITOR-TRANSITION STAFF
desc: Probably a monitor who strikes the party, but we"re not sure.

name: Intro-Teacher
desc: Tell people the rules of CSPC. Try to not talk past 6:30 on Tuesday evening.

name: Intro-Cashier
desc: Deal with the paperwork for newbies.

name: Intro-Ambassador
desc: Ambassador the newbies.

name: Greeter
desc: Sort of like Ambassador but probably closer to the door.

name: Non-Event:Parking Lot
desc: Keep it cleaned up, as much as one can for a property that has about a dozen people telling you what to do.

name: Non-Event: Costo Prep
desc: Go to Costco

name: Non-Event: Costco Intake
desc: put away groceries and sundries from Costco.

name: Kitchen Assistant
desc: Assist with food prep

name: Kitchen Cleanup
desc: throw away the ranch dip that no one ate. wash the dishes and put them away.

name: DJ
desc: Plug in your iPod, load Pandora, go.

name: Door Staff
desc: Stand by the door

name: Grind Staff
desc: Who even knows

name: Transition
desc: Basically you"re strike.

name: Workshop-Cashier
desc: Most people pay in advance.

name: Workshop-EC
desc: check the checklists, hand out surveys afterward

name: Chef
desc: cook your ass off

name: Facilitator
desc: combo of ambassador and monitor

name: Service Facilitator
desc: keep the servers in line
